column1:
Overall Negative Sentiment Percentages
Cleaniness: 23.939394%
Amenities: 21.156250%
Location: 30.666667%
Services: 25.794302%
General: 35.200000%
Value: 24.852381%

Suggestions on How to Improve: 
Cleaniness: Increase quality control to ensure a high level of cleanliness throughout the facility.
Amenities: Increase the selection of amenities available for customers to enjoy and ensure they are kept up to date and working properly.
Location: Improve the location of the facility to make it more conveniently located for customers.
Services: Focus on providing better customer service by training and investing in customer service staff.
General: Increase investment in facilities and infrastructure to ensure a pleasant experience for customers.
Value: Adjust the pricing of services and products to ensure value for money for customers.
